description: Provides build scripts and build tasks that can be used to execute the build of a .NET project.
releaseNotes:
- [#13](https://github.com/pvandervelde/nBuildKit/pull/13) - Msbuild: Add errors and warnings for invalid build states contributed by Petrik van der Velde ([pvandervelde](https://github.com/pvandervelde)) +enhancement
 - [#12](https://github.com/pvandervelde/nBuildKit/pull/12) - Msbuild: Allow users to specify filter for issue tracker when creating release notes contributed by Petrik van der Velde ([pvandervelde](https://github.com/pvandervelde)) +enhancement
 - [#11](https://github.com/pvandervelde/nBuildKit/pull/11) - MsBuild: Provide scripts to store build information for later use contributed by Petrik van der Velde ([pvandervelde](https://github.com/pvandervelde)) +enhancement
 - [#10](https://github.com/pvandervelde/nBuildKit/pull/10) - Adding the ability to push version numbers to the build server as the build number contributed by Petrik van der Velde ([pvandervelde](https://github.com/pvandervelde))
 - [#8](https://github.com/pvandervelde/nBuildKit/pull/8) - MsBuild: Generation of releasenotes need to be pointed to correct issue tracker contributed by Petrik van der Velde ([pvandervelde](https://github.com/pvandervelde)) +fix
 - [#6](https://github.com/pvandervelde/nBuildKit/issues/6) - MsBuild: Create NuGet package containing global build scripts +enhancement
 - [#5](https://github.com/pvandervelde/nBuildKit/pull/5) - Set up deployment in AppVeyor contributed by Petrik van der Velde ([pvandervelde](https://github.com/pvandervelde)) +enhancement
 - [#1](https://github.com/pvandervelde/nBuildKit/pull/1) - MsBuild: Allow template replacement in most file and directory values contributed by Petrik van der Velde ([pvandervelde](https://github.com/pvandervelde)) +enhancement

Commits: c1a2d4434a...e900163df0
